#loading libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(mgcv)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
set.seed()
```

#download provided data
```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2022-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = recode(id, USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) |>
  select(name, id, everything())
```

#create 5,000 bootstrap samples
```{r}
bootstrap_df = weather_df |> 
  modelr::bootstrap(n = 5000) |> 
  mutate(
    models =
      map(
        strap, \(df) lm(tmax ~ tmin + prcp, data = df)),
    results = map(
      models, broom::glance)) |> 
  select(results, .id, rsq) |> 
  unnest(results) |> 
  filter(term %in% c("tmin", "prcp")) |> 
  group_by(,id) |> 
  mutate(beta1xbeta2 = prod(estimate),
        log_beta_product = log(beta1xbeta2)) |> 
  select(log_beta_product, rsq) |> 
  unnest(rsq) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  select(log_beta_product, id, r_squared) |> 
  unique()

      )
  )
```
